vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) through the Alternative Fueling Facilities Program (AFFP) (Contract No. 582-21-22682-AF) to construct a compressed natural gas (CNG) facility at 9811 Harry Hines Boulevard to allow fast fill CNG fueling for City vehicles and equipment in the amount of $400,000.00 for the period June 23, 2021 through April 30, 2023; (2) receipt and deposit of grant funds in an amount not to exceed $400,000.00 in the CNG AFFP Program Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $400,000.00 in the CNG AFFP Program Fund (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Not to exceed $400,000.00 - Financing: Texas Commission on Environmental Quality Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) through the Alternative Fueling Facilities Program (AFFP) (Contract No. 582-21-22682-AF) to construct a compressed natural gas (CNG) facility at 9811 Harry Hines Boulevard to allow fast fill CNG fueling for City vehicles and equipment in the amount of $400,000.00 for the period June 23, 2021 through April 30, 2023; (2) receipt and deposit of grant funds in an amount not to exceed $400,000.00 in the CNG AFFP Program Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $400,000.00 in the CNG AFFP Program Fund (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Not to exceed $400,000.00 - Financing: Texas Commission on Environmental Quality Grant Funds
